message.name: ERR_MISSING_REASON_COMMENTS
message.locale: Rejection Reason for the extension must be entered

message.name: ERR_NEGATIVE_EXTEND_DAYS
message.locale: Days Extended value should not be less than 0

message.name: MESSAGE_FOR_MILESTONE_COMPLETE_ON_TRANSFER_APPLICATION
message.locale: This milestone is no longer valid as the application has been transferred to case

message.name: ERR_EXTEND_DATE_BEFOER_SAME_EXPECTED_END_DATE
message.locale: The extended expiry date must be later than the current expiry date on the timer.

message.name: ERR_EXTEND_DATE_NOT_A_BUSINESS_DAY
message.locale: The extended expiry date must be a business day.

message.name: ERR_EXTEND_DATE_NO_WORKING_PATTERN_BUSINESS_DAY_CONFIGURED
message.locale: The extended expiry date is not a valid business day. Contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_TIMER_WORKFLOW_CONFIGURED_START_TIME_INCORRRECT
message.locale: The default start time for the timer workflows have not been configured correctly
